Code Examples

// Market dip detection and auto-purchase
metal = 'aluminum'
price = 2100  // per ton

if price < 2200:
    print("Market opportunity detected")
    import(metal, qty='50T')
    sell('EU', markup=18%)
// Supply chain optimization
function optimize_supply(metal, region):
    route = best_route(metal, region)
    reroute_supply(metal, via=route)

    if tariff_rate(region) > 10:
        alt_region = find_alternative(region, max_tariff=5)
        print("High tariff detected. Alternative route: " + alt_region)
        return {
            'primary': route,
            'alternative': best_route(metal, alt_region)
        }
    return { 'primary': route }
// Portfolio analysis and ROI projection
portfolio = create_portfolio("Global Metals Q2")
portfolio.add('aluminum', qty='50T', price=2100)
portfolio.add('copper', qty='20T', price=8500)

simulation = portfolio.simulate(timeframe='12M')
print("Expected ROI: " + simulation.roi + "%")
print("Risk assessment: " + simulation.risk + "/10")
